import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-in', templateUrl: './sign-in.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-in.component.css'] }) export class SignInComponent { fullName:string=''; companyName:string=''; companyEmail:string=''; phoneNumber:string=''; onSubmit(){ console.log('Form Submitted:',{ fullName:this.fullName, companyName:this.companyName, companyEmail:this.companyEmail, phoneNumber:this.phoneNumber }); } }
